inputs.name: OTSService
inputs.label: HCL OneTest Server service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the HCL OneTest Server service connection.

inputs.name: teamspace
inputs.label: Team Space Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Team Space name of the project.

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name corresponding to the test.

inputs.name: repo
inputs.label: Repository Link
inputs.helpMarkDown: Repository Link corresponding to the test.

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the test in HCL OneTest Server. It must include the file extension.

inputs.name: ritEnv
inputs.label: API Test Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Test environment corresponding to the test. Mandatory to input the value if you want to run API test.

inputs.name: variables
inputs.label: Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Variables corresponding to the test. The format is key1=value1;key2=value2

inputs.name: datasets
inputs.label: Datasets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Semicolon (;) delimited list of source:replacement datasets for the job to run. For example, dataset1:dataset2;dataset3:dataset4

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Labels
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Comma (,) delimited list of labels for the job to run.

inputs.name: secretsCollectionName
inputs.label: Secrets Collection Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Secrets collection name for the job to run.

inputs.name: azureServer
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Project URL
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify your Azure DevOps Project URL. For example https://hostname/{yourorganization}/{project}. 
The fields Azure DevOps Project URL, Azure DevOps PAT, Test Plan Name & Test Case Name are required to publish test results to the test case.

inputs.name: patToken
inputs.label: Azure DevOps PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify your Azure DevOps Personal Access Token. Optionally, you can add your token to a secret variable and specify the variable name in the form $(your variable name). [More Information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/process/variables?view=azure-devops&tabs=classic%2Cbatch#secret-variables)

inputs.name: testPlanName
inputs.label: Test Plan Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test Plan name from the corresponding Azure DevOps Project.

inputs.name: testCaseName
inputs.label: Test Case Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test Case name from the corresponding Test Plan.

inputs.name: exportReport
inputs.label: Export JUnit Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this option to export the Junit report generated for the test in XML format. Specify the complete path to the directory including the filename. For example, C:/TestFolder/TestFile.xml
